ingredients.ingredient: 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into 1 1/2-inch cubes

cookingTips: Use flavorful potato chips like barbecue or salt-and-vinegar for more taste
Crush chips into varied sizes—some fine, some chunky—for interesting texture
Drizzle melted butter over nuggets before baking for crispier exterior than plain oil
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This clever breading technique uses pantry staples. How comfortable are you with baking versus frying methods, and what flavor profiles appeal to your family?
